hadiths.text: Narrated `Ali:The Prophet (ﷺ) sent me to supervise the (slaughtering of) Budn (Hadi camels) and ordered me to distribute their meat, and then he ordered me to distribute their covering sheets and skins. 'All added, "The Prophet (ﷺ) ordered me to supervise the slaughtering (of the Budn) and not to give anything (of their bodies) to the butcher as wages for slaughtering

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يُعْطَى الْجَزَّارُ مِنَ الْهَدْىِ شَيْئًا
chapter.eng-name: The butcher should not be given anything of the Hadi
